UserName.title: Account user name
UserName.description: The user name with the optional domain (e.g "user" or "domain\user").

EmailAddress.title: Account email address
EmailAddress.description: The email address for the account (e.g. "john@company.com).

OverridePreviousPassword.title: Override previous password
OverridePreviousPassword.description: If true, a previously set EAS password is overriden with a new password in this payload.

Host.title: Internal Exchange Host
Host.description: The IP address or fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the internal Exchange host.

SSL.title: Use SSL for Internal Exchange Host
SSL.description: Send all communication through Secure Socket Layer.

OAuth.title: Use OAuth
OAuth.description: Specifies whether the connection should use OAuth for authentication.

Certificate.title: Identity Certificate
Certificate.description: X.509 certificate (.p12) for inclusion on device.

CertificateName.title: Certificate Name
CertificateName.description: Name or description of the certificate credential.

PreventMove.title: Prevent Move
PreventMove.description: If set to true, messages may not be moved out of this email account into another account. Also prevents forwarding or replying from a different account than the message was originated from.

PreventAppSheet.title: Prevent App Sheet
PreventAppSheet.description: If set to true, this account will not be available for sending mail in any app other than the Apple Mail app.

PayloadCertificateUUID.title: Identity Certificate UUID
PayloadCertificateUUID.description: UUID of the certificate payload to use for the identity credential.

SMIMEEnabled.title: Enable S/MIME
SMIMEEnabled.description: If true, this account supports S/MIME.

SMIMESigningEnabled.title: Enable S/MIME Signing
SMIMESigningEnabled.description: If set to true, S/MIME signing is enabled for this account.

SMIMESigningCertificateUUID.title: S/MIME Signing Certificate
SMIMESigningCertificateUUID.description: The PayloadUUID of the identity certificate used to sign messages sent from this account.

SMIMEEncryptionEnabled.title: Enable S/MIME Encryption
SMIMEEncryptionEnabled.description: If set to true, S/MIME encryption is on by default for this account. As of iOS 12.0, this key is deprecated. It is recommended to use SMIMEEncryptByDefault instead.

SMIMEEncryptionCertificateUUID.title: S/MIME Encryption Certificate
SMIMEEncryptionCertificateUUID.description: The PayloadUUID of the identity certificate used to decrypt messages sent to this account.

SMIMEEnablePerMessageSwitch.title: Enable S/MIME Per Message Switch
SMIMEEnablePerMessageSwitch.description: If set to true, displays the per-message encryption switch in the Mail Compose UI. As of iOS 12.0, this key is deprecated. It is recommended to use SMIMEEnableEncryptionPerMessageSwitch instead.

SMIMESigningUserOverrideable.title: Allow user to toggle S/MIME Signing
SMIMESigningUserOverrideable.description: If set to true, the user can toggle S/MIME signing on or off in Settings.

SMIMESigningCertificateUUIDUserOverridea.title: Allow user to select S/MIME Identity
SMIMESigningCertificateUUIDUserOverridea.description: If set to true, the user can select the signing identity.

SMIMEEncryptByDefault.title: Enable S/MIME Encryption
SMIMEEncryptByDefault.description: If set to true, S/MIME encryption is enabled by default.

SMIMEEncryptByDefaultUserOverrideable.title: Allow user to select S/MIME Encryption
SMIMEEncryptByDefaultUserOverrideable.description: If set to true, the user can toggle the encryption by default setting.

SMIMEEncryptionCertificateUUIDUserOverri.title: Allow user to select S/MIME Encryption Certificate
SMIMEEncryptionCertificateUUIDUserOverri.description: If set to true, the user can select the S/MIME encryption identity and encryption is enabled.

SMIMEEnableEncryptionPerMessageSwitch.title: Allow user to select S/MIME Encryption per message
SMIMEEnableEncryptionPerMessageSwitch.description: If set to true, displays the per-message encryption switch in the Mail Compose UI.

EnableCalendars.title: Enabled Services - Calendars
EnableCalendars.description: Enables/disables the Calendars service for this account.

EnableContacts.title: Enabled Services - Contacts
EnableContacts.description: Enables/disables the Contacts service for this account.

EnableMail.title: Enabled Services - Mail
EnableMail.description: Enables/disables the Mail service for this account.

EnableNotes.title: Enabled Services - Notes
EnableNotes.description: Enables/disables the Notes service for this account.

EnableReminders.title: Enabled Services - Reminders
EnableReminders.description: Enables/disables the Reminders service for this account.

EnableCalendarsUserOverridable.title: Account Modification - Calendars
EnableCalendarsUserOverridable.description: Enables/disables the users to modify the Calendars settings.

EnableContactsUserOverridable.title: Account Modification - Contacts
EnableContactsUserOverridable.description: Enables/disables the users to modify the Contacts settings.

EnableMailUserOverridable.title: Account Modification - Mail
EnableMailUserOverridable.description: Enables/disables the users to modify the Mail settings.

EnableNotesUserOverridable.title: Account Modification - Notes
EnableNotesUserOverridable.description: Enables/disables the users to modify the Notes settings.

EnableRemindersUserOverridable.title: Account Modification - Reminders
EnableRemindersUserOverridable.description: Enables/disables the users to modify the Reminders settings.

disableMailRecentsSyncing.title: Exclude this account from address recents syncing
disableMailRecentsSyncing.description: If true, this account is excluded from address Recents syncing.

MailNumberOfPastDaysToSync.title: Number of days to sync
MailNumberOfPastDaysToSync.description: The number of days since synchronization.

CommunicationServiceRules.title: Communication Service Rules
CommunicationServiceRules.description: The communication service handler rules for this account.

AudioCall.title: BundleIdentifier
AudioCall.description: Bundle identifier for the default application that handles audio calls made to contacts from this account
